Get Started!

Are you looking for :

100 % free website builder Faster than wordpress website A free Elementor alternative

You are in the right place !

Get Started!

﻿

Get Started!

﻿

The freedom to create anything

Free minds need free tools to make the world a better place

Whether you’re a maker about to create a website for the first time or you’re a pro designer or coder making websites for customers, you will love Silex. You have two ways to start: open Silex and start with one of the a free website provided with Silex, or follow a tutorial before you play with the tool. You can always add advanced functionality to your website with code - HTML, CSS, Javascript. It’s time to get your professional website.

﻿

Get Started!

﻿

How to create a free website website

builder in just 3 easy steps:

﻿

Open

Open Silex website builder in a browser,
choose a free designer-made template you like

﻿

Customize

Customize anything on your site,
you can add videos, images, text & more...

﻿

Publish!

When you’re ready,
publish your website to easily share it with the world.

﻿

Total Design Freedom, DIY!

You can customize anything you want

Start with a blank slate or choose from the designer-made templates, released as Creative Commons and included in Silex. With the #1 open source drag and drop website builder, you can customize anything you want. Create beautiful websites with texts, images, videos, slideshows, and more—all without worrying about code. With the Silex, you can design the most custom websites, all on your own.

﻿

Get Started!

﻿

Silex Publication,
Get Online Fast!

Lightning fast

You’ll love how fast you can get online—and look amazing! Silex publication feature will optimize your creation for performance and SEO. And then you choose where you want to host your website, for free on GitHub pages–even with your domain name and without ads, or with and hosting company thanks to the FTP deployment options. When you’re ready, go live in a click.

﻿

Get Started!

﻿

Hacking Without Limits

Lorem ipsum

You can code from within the editor, with immediate feedback and the deployment capabilities of Silex. Add any front end feature. Plug into any third party API, add transitions, animations, typography, loaders, prefetch the pages, add custom forms and change site behavior with JQuery or just HTML, CSS and Javascript. With your hackable website builder, you can create anything you want.

﻿

Get Started!

﻿

The beauty of a static
drag and drop editor

Dolor ipsum

Due to its static nature and the way elements are absolutely positioned, Silex is extremely simple yet powerful: no databases, no security issues, no limitations for the design. Plus it is free and open source so you own your data and get to choose where you store it while working on your website–on your Dropbox or Own Cloud or Next Cloud for their collaborative capabilities, on GitHub for the versioning or FTP or local file system. Most of these services are available online so you can work from anywhere, or use the desktop version to work offline. And finally, Silex generates websites which are so simple that you can host them for free with GitHub Pages, or push directly to any web host.

Get Started!

﻿

﻿

Silex for professionals

Freelancers, agencies, hosting companies, Silex is the best at being customized, white labeled and integrated to your infrastructure

﻿

Get Started!

﻿

Still not convinced? Try our free website builder yourself.

Every day, hundreds of people worldwide use Silex to create websites and own their online presence.

﻿

Get Started!

﻿

Silex for teams

This is a whole new philosophy we have invented here.

We work in teams with Silex since 2006 like this: the developer provides the designer with components which take advantage of all the design features of the drag and drop editor. As a developer you have the tools to hack Silex in no time and add custom client side or server side components, which will then be available to the designer who knows how s.he wants the site to look like and how it is supposed to react to the user interactions. The designer can add a custom component to a site and style it and change its behaviour as needed

Get Started!

﻿

HOSTING COMPANIES

Lorem ipsum

Silex is a great solution for companies who wish to offer a website builder to their customers. Either for retention purposes or as an additional service, Silex can integrate your infrastructure and your services. Join us as we are working on a road map to make Silex even better at white labeling, authentication with third party systems, storage on an existing infrastructure…

﻿

Get Started!

﻿

PAID SERVICES

Lorem ipsum dolor

Silex founder, Alex Hoyau is selling services to support businesses to use Silex as a replacement for their CMS or website builder. When the community support is not enough, contact him by email: b2b AT silex.me

Powerful features for your website

Many useful and powerful functionalities

﻿

Get Started!

﻿

more features

﻿

Industry-Leading SEO

Follow your own personalized SEO plan to get your website found on Google.

﻿

External dynamic content

Copy paste the embed code of your favorite services such as YouTube, SoundCloud, Twitter, etc.

﻿

Forms

Use Silex form component and plug it to Formspree, or embed forms you create with Google forms, Frama Forms, etc.

﻿

Mobile Friendly

Look amazing on every screen with a customizable mobile-friendly version of your website.

﻿

Live web creation

When you change something in Silex, you see the result immediately. Iterating on design is much easier.

﻿

Work Online

Build websites from within the browser, no install required, never lose your data, collaborate, work instantly from any computer.

﻿

Work offline

With the desktop app you can keep your data to yourself and see exactly what Silex does. There is no installation, just launch the app on your computer.

﻿

Learn the standards

Only common settings are available in the visual editor. When you need more, Silex helps you write CSS without leaving the editor and with immediate feedback.

﻿

Do not lock yourself in

We did not create concepts or jargon, we use those from the open web standards. What you learn here will be useful to you, everywhere.

﻿

more about freedom

﻿

Start Silex online

Connect an existing account

Use the instance provided Silex Labs for free, no installation, store your data in your Dropbox, Owncloud, GitHub or FTP, get started immediately!

﻿

Start now!

﻿

Documentation

﻿

Download Silex Desktop App

You are in orbit !

Use the desktop version of Silex to work offline, store your data on your computer - currently MacOS and Linux only.

﻿

Downloads

﻿

Deploy to your Server

And conquer the galaxy!

Use the 1 click install, the docker image or just any server to create an instance of Silex under your own name, for your users or just for hacking

﻿

Start now!

﻿

Documentation

﻿

Use Silex in your project

Hack Silex, get it from npm

Use npm to install Silex on you local computer or include it in a project, then run it with specific parameters or even replace some parts of it

FREE, FREE HOW ?

This is a whole new philosophy we have invented here.

As a non-profit, we’re free to innovate without any pressure to compromise. Silex is free / libre, without hidden costs or licensing hassle. You are welcome to contribute and to offer services to the community.

﻿

HOSTING YOUR SITE

Your work on silex.me will result in an HTML page stored on your computer.

Let Silex publish your site and host it anywhere.
